hero.title: Turning Ideas into Digital Reality
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer specializing in modern web experiences and Machine Learning.

about.p1: Hello! I'm a developer passionate about creating web applications that solve real problems. With a focus on clean code and intuitive interfaces, I always seek the best market practices.
about.p2: I have experience in international projects and collaboration in agile teams. My recent focus has been on integrating AI into web interfaces.

contact.text: I'm available for new opportunities and freelance projects. Get in touch!
